label: Gondwana Unity
description: India united with Antarctica, Australia in southern supercontinent

label: Rift Initiation
description: India begins rifting from Gondwana, Madagascar separates

label: India-Seychelles Split
description: India separates from Seychelles, begins northward journey

label: Deccan Volcanism
description: Massive volcanic eruptions form Deccan Traps, K-Pg boundary

label: Initial Contact
description: India's northern margin first contacts Eurasian plate

label: Hard Collision
description: Major India-Asia collision begins, Himalayan uplift initiates

label: Monsoon Intensification
description: Himalayan uplift strengthens monsoon circulation patterns

label: River Reorganization
description: Major river systems establish modern courses, Sutlej avulsion
